channel.title: Crystal-X Brand new 742 Rsps/ Searching Staff / Join today our community
channel.description:
Crystal-X 742 Welcome to Crystal-X, your #1 742 server! We're an ever expanding server to reach new horizons and more possiblities. We offer alot of fun and cool things like a fully working Nex arena, Crucible, QBD, and so much more!. We're also not VPS hosted , We need donators so we can keep the server online! Join us today to come on an amazing adventure!
Webclient: [b]Coming soon![/b] Download Client: [b]https://www.dropbox.com/s/845f7ka94vbgr04/Crystal-X%20Limited[/b]%20edition.rarForums: [b]www.crystal-x.enjin.com[/b]
Have skype? Add me : Marwanproductions !
I'm also the Owner [Marwan] . The server is 24/7 online! So join today! Some of the server features include (but are not limited to) the following:
Weekly Events Dicing and Flowering! Fully working Nex and Nomad! Double Exp Weekend's! Great starter items for beginners! Great helpful staff! Plenty of stuff to earn and win! Lots of mini-games! Fully working Crucible! All 63 waves of Fight Pits fully work! Fight kiln even works! Tons of bosses that drop great gear! Donors get tons more benefits! Most skills working! (Including slayer!) Full Squeal of Fortune![ Lots, Lots More! (Your Adventure Begins Here) :)

item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

No.
If you code anything yourself, then you will get players. All the 718+ servers thas has been “released” has got everything that your server has got.
